Title: Jonestown: The Life and Death of Peoples Temple
Writer: Marcia Smith (story), Marcia Smith (teleplay), Noland Walker (teleplay)
Actors: Rebecca Moore, Janet Shular, Tim Carter, Stanley Clayton
Plot: Featuring never-before-seen footage, this documentary delivers a startling new look at the Peoples Temple, headed by preacher Jim Jones who, in 1978, led more than 900 members to Guyana, where he orchestrated a mass suicide via tainted punch.
